feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Specify network interface to use by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1963
  • [Feature] Implement middleware to prevent overlapping execution of "RunSpeedtestJob" by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1952
  • [feature] Add environment values for Thresholds during initial setup by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1933

What's Changed

  • [Feature] Added custom "blank" and "filled" Blade directives by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1951
  • [Chore] Add logging configuration file and set stderr as the default by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1958
  • add: Turkish (tr_TR) localization added. by @ramazansancar in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1955
  • [Bug] Fix placeholder erorr messages by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1965
  • Laravel 11.37.0 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1964
  • Release v1.0.3 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1971

New Contributors

  • @ramazansancar made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1955

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.1.0 (ðŸš€ API Endpoints!)
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Add API Tokens management page by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1960
  • [Feature] Added API endpoints to list, get and get the latest results by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1983
  • [Feature] Implement configurable API rate limiting by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1984
  • [Documentation] Document API endpoints using OpenAPI standard by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1985
  • Release v1.1.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1986

API documentation can be found here: https://docs.speedtest-tracker.dev/api/v1

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.0.3...v1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.2.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Stats API endpoint by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1994

What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fixed dynamic filters for start_at and end_at in ListResults API by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1998
  • Laravel 11.38.2 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1992
  • Release v1.2.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1999

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.1.0...v1.2.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.2.1
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Add server name as a filter in the results by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2015

What's Changed

  • [Bug] Cast prune_results_older_than as integer by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2025
  • Laravel 11.41.3 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2021
  • Bump vite from 5.4.11 to 5.4.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2010
  • Release v1.2.1 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2026

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.2.0...v1.2.1

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] Removed WithoutOverlapping middleware and refactored to use SkipIfBatchCancelled by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2030
  • [Bug] Fixed server name filter by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2031
  • Release v1.2.2 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/2032

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2
